amendment.description: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for the Veterans Health Administration's medical community care account to increase accessibility for in-home health care services for veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
